ruling: - The effect of [[Des Frog]] is a Trigger Effect that can be chained to. It activates when [[Des Frog]] is Tribute Summoned successfully.
- Count the number of [[T.A.D.P.O.L.E.]]s when you resolve this effect, not when it activates.
- If you activate the effect of [[Des Frog]] but have no [[Des Frog]]s in your hand or Deck, your opponent can check to confirm.
